links_reviews_title: Beautiful in pictures, awkward in person...
links_reviews_text: I love the colors of this sweater. The drawback is that it's really wide and somewhat fluffy, as in so lightweight it doesn't lay quite right and ends up adding bulk. The length becomes too short when it's so wide. The only thing I didn't wear this month.

I wasn't expecting it, but this sweater was my absolute favorite of my box. So soft and so cozy - I wore it both dressed up for work and then with comfy sweats at night. I did size down one size, didn't have enough length to tuck but I would have found it too bulky anyway. I also didn't mind the center seam. It wasn't awkward and I never even noticed it.
Incredibly soft, cropped just the right amount to hit where you want it to, and is just so darn cute! Will probably end up buying this one.

This is a super weird feeling sweater. It is very thick but light as a feather at the same time. Its kind of itchy as well. Rented a Medium should have gotten an XS I still probably wouldnt have worn it if it fit. Just a weird vibe and fit overall.

This sweater is cute - I got several compliments on it the day I wore it - but I thought the fit was not ideal. It's super boxy (I'm not sure how they tucked it into the models jeans like that) and the neck opening is from collarbone to collarbone. It's a little bit itchy. Since it shows your bra straps, I didn't feel comfortable wearing it to work, which was a bummer for me, but its good for hanging out with friends or on the weekend.
Loved this. So good. Very boxy cut.

Love this! Like most of the Free People sweaters this is intentionally oversized. I wanted it to be less aggressively boxy, so sized down. Still has the relaxed fit but pulled together enough I can wear it to work over a slip dress. Love it styled with high rise jeans & a half-tuck. It's super soft & made me feel like I was getting a warm hug all day long. The weave is tight enough I didn't need an undershirt
I sized down to a medium and this fit, though it arrived looking kind of sad. It was matted and the colors were a lot brighter in person. The neon orange is very bright.

This was absolutely adorable, would order again and again. Tons of complements on this item. Definitely get a size down but I did size down to an XS and it fit right (because it was supposed to fit baggy).

Other reviews mention it runs large, I own a lot of FP sweaters and that's just how they are - big n slouchy. If you buy your size it won't look like the model but I never expect anything to look the way it looks on a size 0 model on me. I wasn't obsessed with how tight the arms were in comparison with the billowy sweater. Big sleeves are everything and this doesn't have those. Sheds little gray floofies everywhere. This was in between and weird. I wore this around my apartment mostly, felt too frumpy wearing it to work.
